EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Pivotal_Roadshow_Q416.Reminder - Dallas 11-3-16
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for signing up to attend the Cloud-Native Roadshow taking place tomorrow in Dallas. We look forward to seeing you there!
Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow—Dallas, TX Friday, November 4, 2016 8:30am – 9:30am Breakfast
9:30am – 12:00pm Sessions 12:00pm – 1:00pm Lunch 1:00pm – 3:30pm Sessions Roadshow Agenda <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/dallas]]>
Location: Dallas/Plano Marriott at Legacy Town Center <[[http://www.marriott.com/hotels/hotel-photos/dalpt-dallas-plano-marriott-at-legacy-town-center/]]> 7121 Bishop Road Plano, Texas 75024 Map & Directions
Parking information <[[http://www.marriott.com/hotels/maps/travel/dalbr-renaissance-dallas-hotel/#property-parking]]>: Parking available onsite for $14 a day Questions? Contact Peter Schmitt at pschmitt@pivotal.io <[[mailto:pschmitt@pivotal.io]]>.
We look forward to seeing you tomorrow!
The Pivotal Team
